紋.definition: line; trace; mark; pattern; grain (of wood etc)

紋喉鳳鶥.definition: (bird species of China) stripe-throated yuhina (Yuhina gularis)

紋喉鵯.definition: (bird species of China) stripe-throated bulbul (Pycnonotus finlaysoni)

紋理.definition: vein lines (in marble or fingerprint); grain (in wood etc)

紋絲不動.definition: to not move a single jot (idiom)

紋絲兒.definition: erhua variant of 紋絲|纹丝[wen2 si1]

紋縷.definition: veined pattern; wrinkles; vein lines (in marble or fingerprint); grain (in wood etc)

紋縷兒.definition: erhua variant of 紋縷|纹缕[wen2 lu:3]

紋繡.definition: cosmetic tattooing; semi-permanent makeup; micropigmentation; embroidery

紋背捕蛛鳥.definition: (bird species of China) streaked spiderhunter (Arachnothera magna)

紋胸啄木鳥.definition: (bird species of China) stripe-breasted woodpecker (Dendrocopos atratus)

紋胸斑翅鶥.definition: (bird species of China) streak-throated barwing (Actinodura waldeni)

紋胸織雀.definition: (bird species of China) streaked weaver (Ploceus manyar)

紋胸鶥.definition: (bird species of China) pin-striped tit-babbler (Mixornis gularis)

紋胸鷦鶥.definition: (bird species of China) eyebrowed wren-babbler (Napothera epilepidota)

紋路.definition: veined pattern; wrinkles; vein lines (in marble or fingerprint); grain (in wood etc)

紋頭斑翅鶥.definition: (bird species of China) hoary-throated barwing (Actinodura nipalensis)

紋風不動.definition: absolutely still; fig. not the slightest change; also written 文風不動|文风不动
